TRANSPORTATION

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ max_width=”1280px” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”18px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”16px” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our School Transportation Service provides a secure, reliable, effcient and cost effective transport solution to all of our students. We have a trained staff of certified drivers and route assistants that ensure safe travels along the entire ride. Our fleet of buses, offers a comfortable and reliable solution for transporting our students, which is safer than any other vehicle; without neglecting comfort and quality service.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”1280px” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”5px|5px|5px|5px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”SCHOOL TRANSPORT MISSION” image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Recurso-2@3x-8-2.png” image_icon_width=”75px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|800||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#353535″ header_font_size=”20px” body_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#f2f2f2″ min_height=”432px” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” body_font_size_tablet=”16px” body_font_size_phone=”14px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#e0e0e0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our mission is to transport students as safely, effciently and cordially as possible. By doing so, the student arrives in a better frame of mind to learn and arrives home with a more positive attitude about the day.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”5px|5px|5px|5px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”TRANSPORTATION APP” image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Recurso-3@3x-8-1.png” image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|800||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#353535″ header_font_size=”20px” body_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#f2f2f2″ min_height=”432px” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” body_font_size_tablet=”16px” body_font_size_phone=”14px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#e0e0e0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

We offer a technological approach that provides our guardians the possibility to monitor their kids along the entire ride through Google Maps using GPS. Notifications will be sent to their smartphones notifying them on route status, eventualities, and important information. They will also be able to contact the route assistants for any urgency that may present.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”5px|5px|5px|5px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”ROUTE NUMBERS ON BUSES” image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Recurso-4@3x-8-1.png” image_icon_width=”130px” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|800||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#353535″ header_font_size=”20px” body_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#f2f2f2″ min_height=”432px” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” body_font_size_tablet=”16px” body_font_size_phone=”14px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#e0e0e0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Each school bus route is assigned a route number which is posted on the side of all buses. All students, especially elementary students, are encouraged to learn the route number for their bus. These route numbers are important when a spare bus or substitute driver is on the route because the bus number will not be the same.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”1280px” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”5px|5px|5px|5px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”CONDUCT ON BUSES” image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Recurso-5@3x-8.png” image_icon_width=”130px” content_max_width=”100%” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|800||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#353535″ header_font_size=”20px” body_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#f2f2f2″ custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” body_font_size_tablet=”16px” body_font_size_phone=”14px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#e0e0e0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Bus transportation is a privilege, and students riding school buses are required to obey all rules and regulations established by the school and driver. Disorderly conduct or other rule violations while riding a school bus may result in denial of this privilege.

Parents are responsible for the safety of their children to and from bus stops and are particularly encouraged to accompany young children.

Thank you for your cooperation in this matter. If you have any questions, please contact the Transportation Offce or the offces for your specific area.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ theme_builder_area=”post_content” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ max_width=”1280px” custom_margin=”||||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” locked=”off” theme_builder_area=”post_content” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_font=”|800||on|||||” text_text_color=”gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29″ text_font_size=”36px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size_tablet=”16px” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29%22:%91%22text_text_color%22%93}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” sticky_enabled=”0″]

excerpt.rendered: TRANSPORTATIONOur School Transportation Service provides a secure, reliable, effcient and cost effective transport solution to all of our students. We have a trained staff of certified drivers and route assistants that ensure safe travels along the entire ride. Our fleet of buses, offers a comfortable and reliable solution for transporting our students, which is safer than any other vehicle; without neglecting comfort and quality service.Our mission is to transport students as safely, effciently and cordially as possible. By doing so, the student arrives in a better frame of mind to learn and arrives home with a more positive attitude about the day.We offer a technological approach that provides our guardians the possibility to monitor their kids along the entire ride through Google Maps using GPS. Notifications will be sent to their smartphones notifying them on route status, eventualities, and important information. They will also be able to contact the route assistants for any urgency that may present.Each school bus route is assigned a route number which is posted on the side of all buses. All students, especially elementary students, are encouraged to learn the route number for their bus. These route numbers are important when a spare bus or substitute […]
